translationBlock.key: Runs the closure on the main thread now, blocking the current thread until it is finished. If the function call is itself being run from the main thread, then the function still will block as expected; it is not an error to call this from the main thread. Unlike running on the main thread later, if the underlying code throws an exception, it is thrown as a normal part of the execution. If the closure returns a value, it is returned by x_run_on_main_thread_now.
